Online typing work is easy and there are many genuine home based typing sites Where you can work from home without any investment. There is more competition in it. So you have to be expert in this work so that you can easily earn money by typing online. Important things for Online typing work For this you should have some important things:- 1. Computer / laptop /smartphone 2. Basic knowledge of computer 3. Good typing speed 4. Fast internet connection Genuine sites for online typing work You can do online typing work without investing on many genuine websites:- Join freelancing websites:- You can earn money by typing online on freelancing sites like Freelance, up Work, Fiverr, Guru, People Per Hours etc sites. FreelancerUp WorkFiverrGuruPeople per hourSocial networking sites:- typing work and jobs are posted on social networking ( Facebook, LinkedIn etc) site. So you can easily earn money by doing online typing work here. Thanks for reading If you like this article so please up vote it

Legitimate typing jobs from home are not easy to find. However, I was able to find a couple of legitimate home based typing jobs. The Smart Crowd will require you to take a typing test to get this part-time data entry work, and the pay is low.Axion Data Services has higher paying positions but rarely has openings. Two to three years experience is preferred and a typing speed of 50 words per minute. There is a fee to register for the database.Here’s a list of legitimate work from home jobs that offer more options. https://carapalmer.com/the-best-online-jobs-from-home-without-an-investment/

There are a lot of ways to earn through typing, these include but are not limited to: TranscriptionContent WritingReviewsEssay WritingData EntrySome of the popular websites that I’ve worked on myself are: Rev2CaptchaTranscribeMeClickWorker
